title: Trick or Treat Cocktail or Thankstini
directions: Blend vodka, pumpkin liqueur, ice, heavy whipping cream, and simple syrup together in a blender until creamy and fluffy. Pour into martini glasses and garnish with a pinch of cinnamon.
ingredients: 8 fluid ounces marshmallow-flavored vodka (such as Smirnoff)
4 fluid ounces pumpkin pie liqueur (such as Fulton's Harvest)
